item.title: Cisco IOS Config Generator
item.description:
Cisco IOS Config Generator

Generate Cisco IOS configuration files for common network setups. Customize configurations for routers, switches, and more.

Device Information

Interface Configuration

Routing Configuration

Static Routes

RIP Configuration

EIGRP Configuration

OSPF Configuration

Security Settings

Adds domain-name if needed and places the RSA key command at the beginning of the configuration
SSH Key Generation

SSH requires RSA keys to be generated on the device. The crypto key generate rsa modulus 2048 command will be included in your configuration.

item.title: Junos Config Generator
item.description:
Junos Config Generator

Generate Juniper Junos configuration files for routers, switches, and security devices. Customize configurations with an intuitive interface.

Features

    • 
            
  • Network services (DHCP, NTP)

item.title: Subnet Calculator
item.description:
<div class="subnet-calculator">
    <div class="input-group">
        <label for="ip">IP Address (IPv4 or IPv6):</label>
        <input type="text" id="ip" placeholder="e.g., 192.168.1.0 or 2001:db8::">
    </div>
    <div class="input-group">
        <label for="cidr">CIDR Notation:</label>
        <input type="number" id="cidr" min="0" max="128" placeholder="e.g., 24 for IPv4, 64 for IPv6">
    </div>
    <div class="input-group">
        <label for="numSubnets">Number of Subnets (optional):</label>
        <input type="number" id="numSubnets" min="0" max="256" placeholder="Leave empty for no subdivision">
    </div>
    <button class="calculate-button" onclick="calculateSubnet()">Calculate</button>
    <div id="result"></div>
</div>

<div class="features-list">
    <h3>Features</h3>
    <ul>
        <li>IPv4 and IPv6 support</li>
        <li>Binary representation of addresses</li>
        <li>Network & Broadcast address calculation</li>
        <li>Usable IP range determination</li>
        <li>Wildcard mask calculation</li>
        <li>IP address classification</li>
        <li>Multiple subnet division calculator</li>
        <li>VLSM support</li>
    </ul>
</div>
